text: Hamilton Hill is a fictional Batman character who is the corrupt mayor of Gotham City. He appears in American comic books published by DC Comics. He helps the Gotham Crime boss such as Rupert Thorne to help him find Batman's secret identity. He hired an assassin to kill Harvey Bullock. == In other media == He was voice by Lloyd Bochner in Batman: The Animated Series. He was also played by Michael Murphy in Batman Returns. ==Other websites== * Hamilton Hill at DC Comics Wiki Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1981 Category:Batman characters Category:DC Comics characters
title: Hamilton Hill (comics)
